original_text: And the cloud of the Lord was upon them by day, when they went out of the camp.
korean_text: 그들이 진영을 떠날 때에 낮에는 여호와의 구름이 그 위에 덮였었더라

sentences.original_text: And the cloud of the Lord was upon them by day
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 구름이 낮에 그들 위에 있었고

sentences.original_text: when they went out of the camp
